descriptor.long_desc: Quik Dry Bath Towels deliver the ultimate experience in comfort. They are lighter, more durable, more absorbent than normal towels and feel

descriptor.name: Exquisite Handcrafted Clay Bowl for Household Items, Artisanal Tableware & Decorative Showpiece, 6 Inches Wide, Perfect for Dry Foods & Storage, Eco-Friendly & Non-Toxic
descriptor.short_desc: Discover the perfect blend of functionality and artistry with our Handcrafted Clay Bowl, meticulously designed for your home. Each bowl, spanning 6 inches in width and 2 inches in depth, is a masterpiece carved by skilled artisans from the finest clay. The intricate hand-carving and delicate brush coloring process imbue each piece with a unique charm, making it not just a bowl, but a piece of art. Ideal for serving dry foods like bhajiya and bhujiya or for storing household items, this versatile bowl adds elegance to any setting. Its solid construction ensures durability, while the absence of chemicals guarantees safety for you and your loved ones. Although not suitable for microwave use, this bowl is easy to clean with just soap and water, ensuring its beauty and functionality for years to come. Priced at Rs. 160, each bowl is securely packed for shipping, promising not only a product but an experience. Embrace the beauty of handcrafted perfection for your home, tableware collection, or as a unique gift.

descriptor.name: Happy Day Advanced Hand Sanitizer Mist Spray - 500ml | 80% Alcohol Volume for Effective Germ Kill | Long-Lasting Protection in Polluted Environments | Compact and Efficient | Manufactured by Be Sanitized, China
descriptor.short_desc: Introducing the Happy Day Advanced Hand Sanitizer Mist Spray, your ultimate partner in maintaining hand hygiene effortlessly. This meticulously designed half-liter bottle contains a powerful 80% alcohol by volume formula, ensuring a high level of protection against germs and viruses. The innovative mist dispenser design not only facilitates easy application but also significantly extends the product's usage, making it a cost-effective solution for daily sanitization needs. With a generous shelf life of 3 years, this sanitizer promises to keep your hands clean, even in the most polluted environments. Manufactured with precision by Be Sanitized in China, this product boasts dimensions that make it both portable and easy to use. Despite its international origins, we offer this premium sanitizer at a competitive price of Rs 250, exclusively for our customers. Stock is limited to 50 units, with a maximum purchase limit of 3 units per customer, ensuring fair access to all. Produced in January 2024 and imported in February 2024, this product adheres to the highest standards of quality and safety. For added peace of mind, we offer a 2-day return policy and a 5-hour cancellation window after order placement. Embrace the Happy Day Advanced Hand Sanitizer Mist Spray for a safer, cleaner, and happier tomorrow.
